com.helger.schematron.ant

Class SchematronPreprocess

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectComponent
      • org.apache.tools.ant.Task
        • com.helger.schematron.ant.SchematronPreprocess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class SchematronPreprocess
extends org.apache.tools.ant.Task
    ANT task to perform Schematron preprocessing. It converts an existing schema to the minimal syntax (by default) but allows for a certain degree of customization by keeping certain elements in the resulting schema. The actual query binding is used, so that report test expressions can be converted to assertions, and to replace the content of <param> elements into actual values.
    Since:
    5.0.0
    Author:
    Philip Helger
